data.quoute: We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person.
data.author: W. Somerset Maugham

data.quoute: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
data.author: George Bernard Shaw

data.quoute: Tell me who admires and loves you, and I will tell you who you are.
data.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

data.quoute: Love is never wrong.
data.author: Melissa Etheridge

data.quoute: We are never so defensless against suffering as when we love.
data.author: Sigmund Freud

data.quoute: Love is suffering. One side always loves more.
data.author: Catherine Deneuve

data.quoute: The course of true love never did run smooth.
data.author: William Shakespeare

data.quoute: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don't, they never were.
data.author: Khalil Gibran

data.quoute: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
data.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

data.quoute: My great hope is to laugh as much as I cry; to get my work done and try to love somebody and have the courage to accept the love in return.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quoute: Being in love is the only transcendent experience.
data.author: Armistead Maupin

data.quoute: I love the name of honor, more than I fear death.
data.author: Julius Caesar

data.quoute: Love is supreme and unconditional; like is nice but limited.
data.author: Duke Ellington

data.quoute: Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.
data.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

data.quoute: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
data.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

data.quoute: I love to think of nature as an unlimited broadcasting station, through which God speaks to us every hour, if we will only tune in.
data.author: George Washington Carver

data.quoute: Woe to the man whose heart has not learned while young to hope, to love - and to put its trust in life.
data.author: Joseph Conrad

data.quoute: The richest love is that which submits to the arbitration of time.
data.author: Lawrence Durrell

data.quoute: It may be true that the law cannot make a man love me, but it can keep him from lynching me, and I think that's pretty important.
data.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

data.quoute: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quoute: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quoute: If your heart is a volcano, how shall you expect flowers to bloom?
data.author: Khalil Gibran

data.quoute: You can give without loving, but you can never love without giving.
data.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

data.quoute: Encouragement to all women is - let us try to offer help before we have to offer therapy. That is to say, let's see if we can't prevent being ill by trying to offer a love of prevention before illness.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quoute: I only cast the actors and actresses I fall in love with - truly having an emotion for them, an anticipation and enthusiasm when seeing them - and I believe that my emotional confidence in them blends into chemistry. It's always been like that, and I hope I won't be wrong in the future.
data.author: Luca Guadagnino

data.quoute: I don't know how racists live with their racism. We need to take the road of love. I don't think folks are born that way; it's learned and taught out of fear.
data.author: Kenny Leon

data.quoute: Love has reasons which reason cannot understand.
data.author: Blaise Pascal

data.quoute: It's useless to hold a person to anything he says while he's in love, drunk, or running for office.
data.author: Shirley MacLaine

data.quoute: Love is when you don't have to be with another person to touch their heart!
data.author: Torquato Tasso

data.quoute: Doubt thou the stars are fire, Doubt that the sun doth move. Doubt truth to be a liar, But never doubt I love.
data.author: William Shakespeare

data.quoute: Love is a hole in the heart.
data.author: Ben Hecht

data.quoute: However weak we are, however poor, however little our faith, or however small our grace may be, our names are still written on His heart; nor shall we lose our share in Jesus' love.
data.author: Charles Spurgeon

data.quoute: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
data.author: Lucille Ball

data.quoute: The striking thing about love and will in our day is that, whereas in the past they were always held up to us as the answer to life's predicaments, they have now themselves become the problem.
data.author: Rollo May

data.quoute: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quoute: Life is like an onion. You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
data.author: Carl Sandburg

data.quoute: The truth is that there is only one terminal dignity - love. And the story of a love is not important - what is important is that one is capable of love. It is perhaps the only glimpse we are permitted of eternity.
data.author: Helen Hayes

data.quoute: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.
data.author: Jesus Christ

data.quoute: Where love is, there God is also.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quoute: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
data.author: Oscar Wilde
